page.description: Perform stritran on the plaintext of html.
page.syntax: HTML_STRITRAN as c( html as c , search as c [, replace as c])
page.discussion: Perform stritran (string replacement, case-insensitive) on the plaintext of html.
page.example:
? html_stritran(" this is in the body ","Body","*BODY TAG*") = " this is in the *BODY TAG* " html = <<%html%

Dim txt as c = "xbasic"

%html% ?html_stritran(html,"xbasic","xbasic") =

Dim txt as c = "xbasic"
